title: Submit Contact Form with Valid Data
description: Verify that the contact form is submitted successfully when all fields have valid data and the server returns HTTP 201.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact page.
Fill 'Name' field with 5-character valid name.
Fill 'Email' field with a valid email format under 255 characters.
Select a valid subject from the enum list (General Inquiry, Membership, Personal Training, Careers).
Fill 'Message' field with valid text between 10 and 1000 characters.
Submit the contact form.
Verify the form submission returns HTTP 201 status and a success toast notification is displayed.
Verify that the message is stored in Supabase contact_messages table.

title: Contact Form Client-Side Validation Enforce Name Field Constraints
description: Verify that the Name field enforces minimum length of 2 and maximum length of 100 characters on client side and displays validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact page.
Input a single character in Name field.
Verify validation error message is displayed for Name field length.
Input a string exceeding 100 characters in Name field.
Verify validation error message is displayed for Name field length.

title: Contact Form Client-Side Validation Enforce Email Constraints
description: Verify that the Email field enforces valid email format and maximum length of 255 characters and displays validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact page.
Input invalid email format (e.g., 'useratexampledotcom') in Email field.
Verify validation error message is displayed for Email field format.
Input a valid email string exceeding 255 characters.
Verify validation error message is displayed for Email field length.

title: Contact Form Client-Side Validation Enforce Subject Enum
description: Verify that the Subject field only allows valid enum selections and rejects invalid entries.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact page.
Try to select or input invalid subject value (not in General Inquiry, Membership, Personal Training, Careers).
Verify the form does not accept invalid subject values and displays an error or prevents submission.

title: Contact Form Client-Side Validation Enforce Message Length
description: Verify that the Message field enforces minimum length of 10 and maximum length of 1000 characters with appropriate validation messages.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact page.
Input less than 10 characters in Message field.
Verify validation error message is displayed for Message field length.
Input over 1000 characters in Message field.
Verify validation error message is displayed for Message field length.

title: Prevent Double Submission on Contact Form
description: Verify that while a contact form submission is processing, the submit button is disabled or multiple submissions cannot be triggered.

steps.description: Fill Contact form with valid data.
Click submit button multiple times rapidly.
Verify that only one submission is processed and the button is disabled or blocked during submission.

title: Server-Side Contact Form Input Validation Rejects Invalid Data
description: Verify that the POST API endpoint validates all fields according to rules and returns HTTP 400 for invalid input.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/contact with invalid Name (e.g., 1 character).
Verify server responds with HTTP 400 and appropriate validation error.
Send POST request with invalid Email format.
Verify HTTP 400 response with email validation error.
Send POST request with invalid Subject not in enum.
Verify HTTP 400 response with subject validation error.
Send POST request with Message less than 10 or more than 1000 characters.
Verify HTTP 400 response with message validation error.

title: Server-Side Contact Form API Success Response and Data Storage
description: Verify that the server correctly stores valid contact message data in Supabase and returns HTTP 201 on successful POST.

steps.description: Send valid POST request with valid contact data to /api/contact.
Verify server responds with HTTP 201 status.
Verify message is stored in Supabase contact_messages table with correct data.

title: Supabase Environment Variables Load and Application Startup Fails When Missing
description: Verify that the application does not start if required Supabase environment variables are missing and shows clear error messages.

steps.description: Remove or unset a required Supabase environment variable.
Attempt to start the application.
Verify the application fails startup with clear error explaining missing configuration.

title: Supabase Row Level Security (RLS) Policies Enforce Correct Permissions
description: Verify that anonymous users can INSERT into contact_messages but cannot SELECT, and authorized admin users can SELECT messages.

steps.description: Attempt anonymous INSERT into contact_messages via Contact form.
Verify INSERT succeeds.
Attempt anonymous SELECT from contact_messages API GET endpoint.
Verify SELECT is denied or returns empty data.
Attempt to SELECT messages with authorized admin credentials.
Verify SELECT returns list of messages.

title: GET API Endpoint Returns Recent Contact Messages Only for Authorized Users
description: Verify that the GET /api/contact returns a list of recent messages when called with valid admin authorization and denies unauthorized requests.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/contact without authorization.
Verify response denies access or returns HTTP 403/401.
Send GET request with valid admin authorization token.
Verify response returns HTTP 200 with list of recent messages.

title: Display Toast Notifications for Success and Error States on Contact Form
description: Verify that after form submission, appropriate success or error toast notifications are displayed, and loading states are shown during submission.

steps.description: Submit Contact form with valid data.
Verify loading state is displayed and success toast notification appears post submission.
Submit Contact form with invalid data.
Verify validation errors and error toast notification are displayed.

title: Responsive Navbar Displays Correctly Across Devices
description: Verify navbar and mobile menu render and function correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes with scroll and active route highlight.

steps.description: Load site on desktop screen size.
Verify full navbar is visible with correct links and active route highlighting.
Resize browser to tablet size and verify navbar adapts.
Verify navbar condenses and mobile menu toggles properly.
Use site on mobile size.
Verify mobile menu opens and closes, links are clickable and active route highlight works.
Scroll page on desktop and mobile.
Verify scroll effects on navbar are correctly applied.

title: Footer Displays Correctly with Links and Social Icons on All Device Sizes
description: Verify site footer renders with all useful links, social media icons, and copyright info correctly on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Load site footer on desktop screen.
Verify footer displays all expected links, icons, and text.
Load site footer on mobile screen.
Verify footer is readable, icons are tappable, and layout is responsive.

title: Membership Page Calendly Scheduling Integration Works Correctly
description: Verify that membership page displays pricing plans and embedded Calendly scheduling component functions correctly for booking consultations.

steps.description: Navigate to Membership page.
Verify pricing plans are visible and formatted as expected.
Verify embedded Calendly scheduling widget loads successfully.
Interact with Calendly widget to book a consultation.
Verify scheduling process completes without errors.

title: Home Page Components Render and Animate Correctly
description: Verify that home page sections (hero, about preview, classes preview, membership preview, contact preview) render correctly with animations and interactivity.

steps.description: Navigate to Home page.
Verify hero section loads with correct heading and call-to-action.
Verify about, classes, membership, and contact preview sections display summary content.
Verify animations trigger correctly on scroll or entry.

title: About Page Displays Trainer Profiles and Achievements
description: Verify About page renders gym info, trainer profiles, achievements, and listed workout types with correct data and layout.

steps.description: Navigate to About page.
Verify gym information and achievements block is visible.
Verify trainer profiles are displayed with images and details.
Verify workout types list is rendered correctly.

title: Classes Page Displays Fitness Class Descriptions and Images
description: Verify that the classes page shows all fitness classes with proper descriptions, images, and related content with carousel if applicable.

steps.description: Navigate to Classes page.
Verify each class is displayed with title, description, and image.
Verify any carousel or brand carousel functions smoothly with navigation controls.

title: Contact Page Calendly Scheduling Link Works and Form Validation is Real-Time
description: Verify contact page displays Calendly scheduling link and that the contact form validates inputs in real-time as user types.

steps.description: Navigate to Contact page.
Verify Calendly scheduling link is visible and clickable.
Enter invalid data into form fields and observe validation messages appear or update in real-time.
Verify that validation feedback updates without page reload.

title: Metadata and SEO Features Are Present Including Sitemap and Robots.txt
description: Verify that base URL, sitemap.xml, robots.txt, and social sharing metadata are present and correctly configured for proper indexing and sharing.

steps.description: Request base URL and verify it is set correctly.
Request /sitemap.xml and verify file exists and contains valid entries.
Request /robots.txt and verify file exists with valid rules.
Inspect page source metadata tags for social sharing (Open Graph, Twitter Card).
Verify metadata tags are present and accurate.
